title: "Unable to connect to the login queue..."
body:
"Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here. If it looks good, follow the guide here."

Been having this error message for the past few weeks, and it's really been bugging me.  I can never log in straight away; it works EVENTUALLY, but I've been getting this error every single day I want to fix this .

What's going on here??

replies.body: There's a good chance that you're still being hit by the login issues we had earlier. They should be clearing up, but you can join in on the [**discussion over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/WEK0auGA-unable-to-connect-to-the-login-queue) for more details!
